channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Moxa
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Moxa

item.title: CVE-2017-12123|2024-08-05T18:28:16.518Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable clear text transmission of password vulnerability exists in the web server and telnet functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. An attacker can look at network traffic to get the admin password for the device. The attacker can then use the credentials to login as admin.

item.title: CVE-2017-14434|2024-08-05T19:27:40.570Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the remoteNetmask0= parameter in the "/goform/net\_Web\_get_value" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14437|2024-08-05T19:27:40.462Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP URI can cause a null pointer dereference resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a GET request to "/MOXA\_LOG.ini" without a cookie header to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12129|2024-08-05T18:28:16.808Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable Weak Cryptography for Passwords vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. An attacker could intercept weakly encrypted passwords and could brute force them.

item.title: CVE-2017-12128|2024-08-05T18:28:16.349Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the Server Agent functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted TCP packet can cause information disclosure. An attacker can send a crafted TCP packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14435|2024-08-05T19:27:40.480Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP URI can cause a null pointer dereference resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a GET request to "/MOXA\_CFG.ini" without a cookie header to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14433|2024-08-05T19:27:40.460Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the remoteNetwork0= parameter in the "/goform/net\_Web\_get_value" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12127|2024-08-05T18:28:16.432Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: A password storage vulnerability exists in the operating system functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. An attacker with shell access could extract passwords in clear text from the device.

item.title: CVE-2017-14438|2024-08-05T19:27:40.554Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: Exploitable denial of service vulnerabilities exists in the Service Agent functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted packet can cause a denial of service. An attacker can send a large packet to 4000/tcp to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12124|2024-08-05T18:28:16.571Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP URI can cause a null pointer dereference resulting in the web server crashing. An attacker can send a crafted URI to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12121|2024-08-05T18:28:16.346Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the rsakey\_name= parm in the "/goform/WebRSAKEYGen" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12126|2024-08-05T18:28:16.415Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP packet can cause cross-site request forgery. An attacker can create malicious HTML to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12125|2024-08-05T18:28:16.563Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the CN= parm in the "/goform/net_WebCSRGen" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14459|2024-08-05T19:27:40.529Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable OS Command Injection vulnerability exists in the Telnet, SSH, and console login functionality of Moxa AWK-3131A Industrial IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n wireless AP/bridge/client in firmware versions 1.4 to 1.7 (current). An attacker can inject commands via the username parameter of several services (SSH, Telnet, console), resulting in remote, unauthenticated, root-level operating system command execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-14436|2024-08-05T19:27:40.487Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP URI can cause a null pointer dereference resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a GET request to "/MOXA\_CFG2.ini" without a cookie header to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14432|2024-08-05T19:27:40.519Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the openvpnServer0_tmp= parameter in the "/goform/net\_Web\_get_value" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14439|2024-08-05T19:27:40.801Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: Exploitable denial of service vulnerabilities exists in the Service Agent functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted packet can cause a denial of service. An attacker can send a large packet to 4001/tcp to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12120|2024-08-05T18:28:16.339Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation, resulting in a root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the ip= parm in the "/goform/net_WebPingGetValue" URI to trigger this vulnerability.
